import React from "react"; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from "react-router-dom"; import { MDBInput, MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBDropdown, MDBDropdownToggle, MDBDropdownMenu, MDBDropdownItem, MDBIcon, MDBSideNavItem, MDBSideNavCat, MDBSideNavNav, MDBSideNav, MDBContainer } from "mdbreact"; import logo from './Lib/logo.jpg' export class HomePage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { toggleStateA: false }; } handleToggleClickA = () => { this.setState({ toggleStateA: !this.state.toggleStateA }); }; render() { const mainStyle = { paddingTop: "5rem" }; const specialCaseNavbarStyles = { WebkitBoxOrient: "horizontal", flexDirection: "row" }; return (
